## IStateStorage.cancel property

Optional method to cancel any pending activity [syncState()](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-public-state_sync.syncstate.md) will call it during destroy, if it is provided by IStateStorage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cancel?: () => void;
```
